attributes.action: Commence an asbestos removal programme in all schools
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Between 2000 and 2005, 106 teachers have died from asbestos related mesothelioma.  (HSE Statistics).

It is unacceptable that in 2009, such a high number of preventable deaths are occurring.

If the teachers are exposed to asbestos and are contracting a cruel and fatal illness then surely the children will also be exposed.

This is an issue, which can be easily corrected.  Legionnella is better controlled than asbestos which is surely wrong when every day we hear advertisements aimed at the construction industry to tell us just how dangerous asbestos is and how many are exposed and die every week.

Each school has adequate time to remove asbestos during holidays it is a matter of finacing the programme which would create much needed work for the struggling construction industry.
